tool.name: whatweb_scan
tool.description: Fingerprints a target web application to identify CMS, server, libraries, and frameworks.

parameter.name: aggression
parameter.description: Aggression level (1-4). 1 is passive, 4 is aggressive. Default is 1.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: If true, returns detailed plugin information.

tool.name: theharvester_search
tool.description: Gathers OSINT information (emails, subdomains, virtual hosts) for a domain from public sources.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of results to fetch per source. Default is 100.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: The search engine/source to use (e.g., 'google', 'bing', 'all'). Default is 'all'.

tool.name: feroxbuster_scan
tool.description: High-speed recursive directory discovery. Best for finding hidden files and folders.

parameter.name: wordlist
parameter.description: Path to a custom wordlist. Default is raft-medium-files.txt.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.description: Number of concurrent threads. Default is 50.

parameter.name: extensions
parameter.description: Comma-separated file extensions to look for (e.g., 'php,txt,bak').

tool.name: kiterunner_scan
tool.description: Scans for API endpoints with specialized wordlists. Better than generic fuzzers for APIs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The target URL or IP to scan.

parameter.name: wordlist
parameter.description: The wordlist to use. Default is common.txt.

tool.name: graphw00f_scan
tool.description: Fingerprints the specific GraphQL engine running on a target endpoint.

tool.name: clairvoyance_scan
tool.description: Attempts to reconstruct a GraphQL schema from an endpoint using brute-force if introspection is disabled.
